南加州大学诺里斯分校将在纽波特海滩开设最先进的癌症中心，提供先进的放射治疗南加州大学诺里斯综合癌症中心是南加州大学凯克医学的一部分，将在纽波特海滩开设一个中心，提供放射治疗和诊断成像方面的最新进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/USC-Norris-to-open-state-of-the-art-cancer-center-in-Newport-Beach-with-advanced-radiation-therapy。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/USC-Norris-to-open-state-of-the-art-cancer-center-in-Newport-Beach-with-advanced-radiation-therapy。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5ae0adc5-9188-4e31-bea8-d82945c680dd Wed, 07 Aug 2024 15:28:57 -0400 USC Norris to open state-of-the-art cancer center in Newport Beach with advanced radiation therapy
孕妇 BPA 水平升高与儿子患自闭症有关弗洛里研究人员发现，有证据表明，生下患有自闭症儿子的孕妇体内塑料化学物质双酚 A (BPA) 的含量较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Higher-BPA-levels-in-pregnant-mothers-linked-to-autism-in-sons.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Higher-BPA-levels-in-pregnant-mothers-linked-to-autism-in-sons.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1cc08f1-476c-4bc8-94d0-696f2610a8c4 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 15:23:46 -0400 Higher BPA levels in pregnant mothers linked to autism in sons
细胞中的核糖体在蛋白质折叠中起着至关重要的作用伦敦大学学院的科学家们在《自然》杂志上发表的论文中描述了核糖体在细胞中新蛋白质折叠过程中发挥的新作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Ribosomes-in-cells-play-a-crucial-role-in- Protein-folding.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Ribosomes-in-cells-play-a-crucial-role-in- Protein-folding.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9b2114eb-82da-4338-b614-6a38f9a454ee Wed, 07 Aug 2024 15:19:31 -0400 Ribosomes in cells play a crucial role in protein folding

卫生专家警告说，奥运会可能会加剧热带疾病的传播全球卫生专家警告说，随着当局在法国首都加强疾病监测，登革热、寨卡病毒和基孔肯雅热等蚊媒疾病可能会通过奥运会传播到通常不流行的国家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Olympic-games-could-fuel-spread-of-tropical-diseases-warn-health-experts.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Olympic-games-could-fuel-spread-of-tropical-diseases-warn-health-experts.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f2dd8bd8-1a55-4183-8e3c-c9fa0b60bfbf Wed, 07 Aug 2024 14:59:18 -0400 Olympic games could fuel spread of tropical diseases, warn health experts
解码胶质母细胞瘤：分子亚型和间充质转化机制的新见解多形性胶质母细胞瘤（GBM）是肿瘤学领域的一个强大对手，其特点是分子复杂性和不断的进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Decoding-glioblastoma-New-insights-into-molecular-subtypes-and-mesenchymal-transition-mechanisms.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Decoding-glioblastoma-New-insights-into-molecular-subtypes-and-mesenchymal-transition-mechanisms.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fb787714-8561-4f08-a5dc-cd5b67698fe3 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 14:48:21 -0400 Decoding glioblastoma: New insights into molecular subtypes and mesenchymal transition mechanisms
研究揭示儿童多系统炎症综合征背后的自身免疫机制研究揭示了儿童多系统炎症综合征（MIS-C）背后的机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Research-reveals-autoimmune-mechanism-behind-multisystem-炎症-syndrome-in-children.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Research-reveals-autoimmune-mechanism-behind-multisystem-炎症-syndrome-in-children.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15f868ca-f02b-4d4d-a711-ffabc586cdb5 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 13:44:44 -0400 Research reveals autoimmune mechanism behind multisystem inflammatory syndrome in children

研究表明，感觉神经驱动乳腺癌生长和扩散癌症不会在真空中生长——每种肿瘤都在体内特定的微环境中生长，并通过错综复杂的脉管系统和神经网络扩散。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Sensory-nerves-drive-breast-cancer-growth-and-spread-study-reveals.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Sensory-nerves-drive-breast-cancer-growth-and-spread-study-reveals.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=62cf691d-81e4-41b1-b7d6-abe2dd2788f0 Wed, 07 Aug 2024 13:30:10 -0400 Sensory nerves drive breast cancer growth and spread, study reveals
研究发现，健康饮食和运动可以降低 2 型糖尿病的遗传风险东芬兰大学的一项新研究在世界上首次表明，健康饮食和定期锻炼可以降低 2 型糖尿病的风险，即使对于具有高遗传风险的个体也是如此。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Healthy-diet-and-exercise-can-mitigate-genic-risk-for-type-2-diabetes-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240807/Healthy-diet-and-exercise-can-mitigate-genic-risk-for-type-2-diabetes-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4ba70748-c0ff-4810-b12c-d2c71781414b Wed, 07 Aug 2024 13:24:37 -0400 Healthy diet and exercise can mitigate genetic risk for type 2 diabetes, study finds
